snippet: The future might look grim in Europe, but in the past things were invariably worse. As the Continent marks 67 years of peace, it could be time to start looking on the bright side.
abstract: The future might look grim in Europe, but in the past things were invariably worse. As the Continent marks 67 years of peace, it could be time to start looking on the bright side.

headline.main: A Day For Europe to Count Its Blessings
